name: White Ape
description: The White Ape is a large, powerful creature with exceptional physical prowess and magical abilities, featuring a strong build and notable agility.
memorable: This creature can inflict arcane wasting disease, causing mental deterioration to spellcasters.
goals: The White Ape typically seeks to dominate and incapacitate its opponents, particularly spellcasters.
relations: May be found alongside other magical beasts or in areas with strong arcane influences.
environment: Usually found in magical forests or areas steeped in arcane energy.
strengths: Possesses high Strength and Constitution, durable and capable of significant damage.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma limit its ability for interaction and intelligence-based skills.
attacks: Employs a Multiattack with a Bite and two Fist attacks, featuring powerful bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Arcane Wasting, a disease that can severely weaken spellcasters over time.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 15, indicating good awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Skilled in Athletics and Intimidation, showcasing its physical abilities and presence.
additional_information: Gains advantage on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance.
Can attack multiple creatures in one turn with its Frenzy ability.
Focuses its attacks on those using magic with Spellcasting Animosity.
Can inflict significant damage with its physical attacks.
Serves as a formidable foe for adventurers due to its combination of strength and magical resistance.
test_queries: large ape with debilitating magical abilities
monstrous white ape that inflicts disease
powerful melee attacker with magic resistance
formidable ape known for arcane wasting disease
